name: Tidy Tactics: Garden Minigame
description:
Plant dice to grow flowers! If two flowers bloom next to each other, they will pollinate each other. When the flowers die, they will produce new dice that can be planted. Rinse and repeat.

Can you grow the elusive red flower? This will require some good luck or careful breeding. If you want to know how it works, google alleles. 

Did all your flowers die lonely? Wait a while and the wind will bring in new dice. They just won't be very special.

Controls

  • Click to move. 
  • Click the tile you are standing on to pick up or plant a seed. 
  • Scroll to zoom.

Technical details

  • Running entirely on HTML/CSS/JS/WebGL2.
  • Built with a custom "engine" on top of rahti and rahti-webgl2.
  • Rendered entirely in janky fragment shaders using 2D signed distance fields and some gradient noise. No textures! 🤓

PS. Sound? Music?! In this economy??
